title: WEIRD INTERACTION
body: So i was playing some ranked games earlier today and im not gunna lie i had a pretty big loss streak but still had a clean kda for the most part, anyway i didnt let that discourage me and i finally pulled out a win and after the match was over a weird banner showed. It was almost like i ranked up except all it said was something along the lines of your skills have been noticed and the boss is coming to see you soon then it disapeared. just curious if anyone knew anything about it.
